类 SlidingButton

java.lang.Object
org.kelvinizer.buttons.SlidingButton
所有已实现的接口:
Drawable, Focusable, Scalable
public class SlidingButton extends Object implements Focusable, Drawable, Scalable
The SlidingButton class represents a UI component consisting of a base, a slider, and an optional verdict text. The slider allows users to select a value within a defined range.

  • 构造器概要

    • SlidingButton

      public SlidingButton(double minVal, double maxVal, double startVal)
      Constructs a SlidingButton with specified minimum, maximum, and initial values.
      参数:
      minVal - the minimum value of the slider
      maxVal - the maximum value of the slider
      startVal - the initial value of the slider

  • 方法详细资料

    • setBaseAndSlider

      public void setBaseAndSlider(CRect base, CRectButton slider)
      Sets the base rectangle and slider button for the sliding button.
      参数:
      base - the CRect representing the base
      slider - the CRectButton representing the slider

      Moves the slider based on the provided mouse event.
      参数:

    • moveSlider

      public void moveSlider(double delta)
      Moves the slider by a specified delta value.
      参数:
      delta - the change in value to move the slider
